title: Code Geass: Fukkatsu no Lelouch Picture Drama
content:
A slight disclaimer, do not watch this unless you've seen Code Geass: Fukkatsu no Lelouch.

I feel like Picture Dramas is just the PC term for excusable fanservice, or maybe, at least in Code Geass" case. The first episode shows a pirate with an interesting grass power that acts as a lie detector, questioning the main cast that he holds hostage, and the second one is just the girls enjoying a Turkish bath.

I liked the art quite a bit, that is, compared to what I've seen from the past Picture Dramas, it's sharper, the colors are vibrant, closer to a water painting.
